name: Soul Resomance
description:
SUMMARY

(player) dies from a k*shin and regrets not telling her feelings to the one she loves.  A year later, Kid finds her old necklace next to her grave,  bringing her soul out into the world once again. Will she be able to pass on peacefully? Or completely disappear without fulfilling her regrets?

FEATURES

28k words with 1-2 hours of gameplay depending on how fast you read

3 character good endings

3 CG art

Extras menu with custom art made by TdotAkichan (Coming soon)

NOTES BEFORE PLAYING

This game is aimed towards girls, but anyone can play if your digging love games with boys. :)

Streaming/posting a video of gameplay is allowed as long as it's the first 10 minutes only

There are some glitches and bugs due to the engine being old and outdated and can not be fixed, and I do not use the top left menu of the game screen at all so use at your own risk! I only use the save/load function in-game. I also plan to make the screen bigger later but I will have to resize everything to fit the engine screen so it will have to wait.

If you find any typos or anything else, let me know.

If you enjoyed the game or want to support the team for more games (and hopefully to hire a programmer) you can follow this page or donate on ko-fi. We plan to make more original games than fan games. This game was just a start for learning game development.
